title: FedEx Warns of Shipping Delays as Omicron Hurts Staffing Levels
sub_head: Severe winter storms around the country, including at company’s Memphis, Tenn., hub, are also hurting deliveries
body:
FedEx Corp. is warning that the spread of the Omicron variant is contributing to staffing shortages and delaying shipments traveling on aircraft.
“The explosive surge of the COVID-19 Omicron variant has caused a temporary shortage of available crew members and operational staff in the FedEx Express air network,” the company said in service alerts this week.
